body_html:
@yaroslavvb While I'm testing the neural-style code by @jcjohnson, I found using lbfgs optimizer got cost function ~12% less than using adam optimizer, with fixed number of iterations. There are also some discussions on these two optimizers on style transfer.

So that is the use case that I run into this issue. Thanks for the work!
body_text:
@yaroslavvb While I'm testing the neural-style code by @jcjohnson, I found using lbfgs optimizer got cost function ~12% less than using adam optimizer, with fixed number of iterations. There are also some discussions  on these two optimizers on style transfer.
So that is the use case that I run into this issue. Thanks for the work!
body:
@yaroslavvb While I'm testing the neural-style code by @jcjohnson, I found using lbfgs optimizer got cost function ~12% less than using adam optimizer, with fixed number of iterations. There are also some [discussions ](https://www.reddit.com/r/MachineLearning/comments/3u1ssk/neural_style_in_tensorflow/) on these two optimizers on style transfer. 

So that is the use case that I run into this issue. Thanks for the work!
